job_title: I help organizations build fast, scalable web apps with ASP.NET Core / MERN

projects.name: Box.com Downloader
projects.description: This application can scrape and download protected docx, pdf files in box.com and save it as an editable PDF file.

projects.name: Team Chords
projects.description: A chord charting tool for the band with the ability to create, edit, and share chords and set lists. Built with React, Tailwind, ChordSheetJS, and Supabase.

projects.name: Camano Law Firm Website
projects.description: The Camano Law Firm brand website. Built with React, Shadcn/UI, Contentful, and Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: Markdown Previewer
projects.description: My solution to freeCodeCamp.org's Markdown Previewer challenge. Created with Vite. Markdown previewer developed with React and Marked.js.

projects.name: Arabic to Roman Numeral Converter
projects.description: This is an app that converts Arabic numbers to Roman numerals. This app utilizes React and Next.js. Click to try now.

projects.name: Scroll Lock Toggle Utility
projects.description: A small utility for toggling scroll lock written in C for Windows.

about.name: Paul Abib Camano
about.bio: I am a software engineer with a passion for building fast, scalable web applications. I specialize in ASP.NET Core and the MERN stack, and I love creating tools that help people be more productive. In my free time, I enjoy contributing to open source projects and exploring new technologies.
